pinyin: Mei3 suo3 bu4 da2 mi3 ya4

definition: the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
to search/to demand/to ask/to exact/large rope/isolated
surname Suo/abbr. for 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3], Somalia
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent

sentences.english: A golden jackal seen in the Mesopotamian marshes.
sentences.chinese: 这是一只生活在美索不达米亚沼泽中的金色豺狼。

sentences.english: Mesopotamia was the world’s first civilization.
sentences.chinese: 美索不达米亚是世界上最古老的文明。

sentences.english: Irrigated fields provided the Mesopotamians with everything they needed to live.
sentences.chinese: 灌溉的田地为美索不达米亚人提供了生活所需的一切。

sentences.english: Many of these traditions began with the Mesopotamian celebration of New Years.
sentences.chinese: 圣诞节传统起源于美索不达米亚的新年庆祝活动。

sentences.english: The alluvial plains in Mesopotamia are perfectly suitable for high food production.
sentences.chinese: 美索不达米亚的冲积平原非常适合生产高生量的食物。

sentences.english: Many of these traditions began with the Mesopotamian celebration of New Years.
sentences.chinese: 许多这些传统开始于美索不达米亚庆祝新年。

definition: Sumer (Šumer), one of the early civilizations of the Ancient Near East
Phoenicia, ancient civilization along the coast of the Mediterranean Sea
Sassanid Empire of Persia (c. 2nd-7th century AD)
